editorialNotes.tagline: Do you want to buy a vowel?
editorialNotes.standard:
Whats so fun aboutspinning that wheel? Our three favorite things:
1. Lightning-fast rounds make forthe perfect quick-fix word game.
2. Playing friends head to head is irresistible. So isbuilding puzzles for them to solve.
3. We never get tiredof solvingpuzzles at the last second and winning bonus rounds.

editorialNotes.standard: Whether playing in the same room or remotely, passions can run wild while trying to get everyone to agree in Wavelength. The more people playing, the better, as youll find little consensus on how, say, roller coasters rank on a scale from thrilling to terrifying. You might even learn something new about your friends. We all agree on one thing, though: Its one of the best party games weve played.
